metadata.title: CVE-2014-125024 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in FFmpeg 2.0. It has been rated as critical.Affected by this issue is the function lag_decode_frame. The manipulationleads to memory corruption. The attack may be launched remotely. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.

criterions.comment: ffmpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
